items.name: Rockport Men's Dressports 2 Go Plain Toe Oxford
items.description: The dressports collection brings in classic designs with the comfort you expect from Rockport.

items.name: Midtown Cap Toe Oxford Men's Dress Shoes
items.description: The clean design of the Florsheim Midtown cap toe oxford is highlighted by its simple stitching details and modern silhouette.

items.name: Dockers Mens Irving Slip Resistant Oxford Shoes
items.description: Keep your style sleek, refined, and worry-free with these slip-resistant Dockers dress shoes.

items.name: TED BAKER MAEVEJ STERLING CHECK SUIT IN BLUE
items.description: Fully lined with graphic print, Modern fit, Built-in pocket sqare, 100% Wool with Polyester lining and Viscose/Acetate sleeve lining.

items.name: PRADA Single-breasted cotton suit
items.description: This black cotton suit is a stalwart showcase of Prada's tailoring expertise. It's crafted in Italy comprised of a single-breasted jacket and trousers, the former of which is shaped with padded shoulders and notch lapels and finished with three front pockets. In turn, the trousers are crafted to a slim fit with a mid-rise waist and finished with coordinating belt loops and unfinished hems to allow for personal adjustments.

items.name: PAUL SMITH SOHO TAILORED FIT SUIT IN GREY
items.description: Contrast lining, Unfinished trouser, Notched lapel with Melton wool under-collar, Flap pockets with contrast lining, 100% Wool, Made in Italy.

items.name: EMPORIO ARMANI M-LINE 2 PIECE WOVEN SUIT IN NAVY CHECK
items.description: Tailored Emporio Armani suit, characterised by an impeccable cut and the special attention paid to the selection of the finest materials. An Emporio Armani suit guarantees elegance at every occasion, from the office to a gala dinner. Made from virgin wool, it consists of a lapel jacket with side slits, flapped welt pockets and a breast pocket suitable for a pocket square. The unfinished trousers have side pockets.

items.name: DIESEL THOMMER 0688H SLIM JEANS IN BLACK
items.description: Slim style Diesel Thommer jeans with a clean design. The leg narrows from knee to ankle and has more room on the thigh.

items.name: 7 FOR ALL MANKIND SLIMMY TAPERED LUXE JEANS IN DEEP BLUE
items.description: Men's 7 For all Mankind’s jeans, the Slimmy Tapered is a modern slim fit men’s jean, designed with a 32” inseam, mid-rise and narrower leg opening than the original Slimmy. Luxe Performance Plus Deep Blue is a smart-casual denim wash with subtle wear patterns and tonal hardware. Created using a unique blend of high stretch fibres for elevated performance and unrivalled comfort.

pants.name: Jeans
pants.description: Casual jeans that can be worn anywhere.

items.name: Canada Goose Chateau Down Parka
items.description: Drawstring hood with top cinch strap, Front two-way zip with button closure, Long sleeves with interior ribbed cuffs, logo patch on left sleeve, Chest zip pocket, two side slit pockets, back logo locker loop, Interior zip pocket, two interior patch pockets, lined.

items.name: BEN SHERMAN Navy Melton Overcoat
items.description: Cool and progressive, Ben Sherman tailoring is adept in smart, refined pieces and casual suiting. This navy overcoat is a stylish and comfortable layering piece, perfect for the coming season. This overcoat features a single breasted 3 button front and notch lapel, with complementary internals. This overcoat will team perfectly with any Ben Sherman new season suit for a sharp daytime ensemble.

jackets.name: Jackets/Coats
jackets.description: Comfortable and warm jackets and coats.

items.name: JEFF BANKS Stvdio Fly Front Wing Collar Shirt and Bow Tie Set
items.description: This sharp, superbly crafted shirt features a wing collar and fly-front placket, with double cuffs and a cuff tab detailing – perfect for cufflinks.

items.name: BEN SHERMAN Geo Print Shirt
items.description: This eye-catching, geo print shirt from Ben Sherman features long sleeves, a slim fit and a classic point, concealed button-down collar – all in 100% cotton for supreme comfort and style.

items.name: TED BAKER White Slim Fit Shirt
items.description: Loaded with detail, Ted Baker's button-ups are a step above the rest, with branded buttons and contrast internal lining, all in a long-sleeved cotton button-up for the discerning trendsetter.

shirts.name: Shirts
shirts.description: Take your occasionwear to new heights.

items.name: LIMEHAUS Burgundy Tie & Geo Hank Set
items.description: The fashion-forward Limehaus brand offers a sharp, slim blade tie at an affordable price, this set offers a burgundy tie and complementing geo design hankie that is perfect to complete any outfit.

items.name: SCOTT & TAYLOR Silver Gold Stripe Cufflinks
items.description: This pair of silver, gold stripe cufflinks are presented in a branded gift box and are the perfect addition to any Scott & Taylor suit, shirt combination.
